p: Pastor et al. 3 identified perfluoroalkanoic acid derivatives as impurities via GC/MS and suggested their free form via Raman spectroscopy investigations. To consider their contribution to pH changes, Fourier-Transform-Infrared-Spectrometer (FT-IR) studies were performed to determine the perfuorooctanoic acid content with 1-mm thick liquid cells, potassium bromide (KBr) windows, 64 scans, resolution 2 cm −1, using the peak at 1773 cm −1 and external standard method.
